channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: On a essayé l’Opel Mokka GSe : une voiture électrique pensée comme une essence performante
item.description: On a toujours tendance à opposer voiture électrique et thermique. Mais si l’on décidait de prendre la recette d'une petite GTI pour l'appliquer à une voiture électrique, quel serait le résultat ? Opel l'a tenté avec son Mokka GSe, que nous avons pu essayer sur route et sur circuit !

item.title: Best Tested Walking Pads (2025): Urevo, WalkingPad, Sperax
item.description: These compact walking pads fit under your desk and make staying active so much easier.

item.title: Inside the AI-powered assault on SaaS: why identity is the weakest link
item.description: Your SaaS security isn’t failing at the perimeter—AI-powered identity breaches are bypassing it entirely.

item.title: I tested Ring’s new outdoor camera in my garden and was blown away by the picture quality (and high price tag)
item.description: The Ring Outdoor Cam Pro's 4K resolution and 10x magnification with pinch-to-zoom give you a better view than ever

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Monday, December 15 (game #1421)

item.title: Bored with smartphones? These 5 upcoming flagships could change your mind in 2026
item.description: Some of the most exciting phones in years could be landing in 2026, from the iPhone Fold to the Ayaneo Pocket Play and beyond.

item.title: 10 Best Portable Power Stations (2025): Power Capacity, Portability, Camping, and More
item.description: Whether you’re going off-grid or safeguarding against blackouts, these beefy, WIRED-tested batteries can keep the lights on.

item.title: The end of OpenAI, and other 2026 predictions
item.description: Here's a thought: what if the next-generation Siri is awesome? Not just awesome for setting timers and dictating text messages (though that would be nice), but so awesome and fun to talk to that people actually start falling in love with their iPhones. We may not be prepared for what happens next. On this episode […]

item.title: Ce TV 4K sur batterie que l’on peut déplacer comme une tablette géante perd 100 € de son prix
item.description: Le Thomson Go+ Pro est un TV/écran 4K tactile de 27 pouces, monté sur un pied équipé de roulettes, à retrouver pour 599,99 euros au lieu de 699,99 euros sur Darty.

item.title: Nanit Home Display Review: A Transformative Tablet
item.description: The innovative smart baby monitor ecosystem adds a tablet to its lineup. Is it worth overlooking some quirks?

item.title: I’m finally beginning to trust Microsoft’s handheld Xbox
item.description: I still wouldn't buy an Xbox Ally, and I still don't think the tweaked version of Windows that shipped with it is ready for primetime. The Xbox Full Screen Experience (FSE) needs work. But two months after I panned the cheaper $600 white Xbox Ally and wasn't quite sold on the $1,000 black one, one […]

item.title: Robin Hood episode 8 proved we should ‘celebrate our power’ — and star Connie Nielsen wants us to do the same
item.description: If women aren’t watching Robin Hood by episode 8, they need to now — one star has just ‘informed our view of who we can really be’.

item.title: iPadOS 26.2 is rolling out now, and it makes multitasking much easier – here's what's new
item.description: Split View and Slide Over are getting more straightforward with the latest iPadOS update, available now.
